name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James A. LOVELY, Appellant

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John R. Merrick, Public Defender, Lee E. Morrison, Kévin J. Ryan, West Chester, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 464
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James A. LOVELY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued June 23, 1975.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
John R. Merrick, Public Defender, Lee E. Morrison, Kévin J. Ryan, West Chester, for appellant.
William H. Lamb, Dist. Atty., F. Ned Hand, Timothy H. Knauer, Asst. Dist. Attys., Vincent M. Dadamo, Asst. Dist. Atty., West Chester, for appellee.
Before, JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, J J.
